events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for the product as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund and wrong item.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah for handling the refund request and further communication.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process the refund more quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived at my address.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and send a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund and return label offer and will send the item back shortly.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return label was emailed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and managed to return the wrong item without issues. We’re here to help if needed.
We’re closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and cooperation. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your customer service experience to help us improve.
